Package meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class CDT

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.ProblemTransformationMethod
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CDN
            • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CDT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiXClassifier, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class CDT
extends CDN
    CDT.java - Conditional Dependency Trellis. Like CDN, but with a trellis structure (like CT) rather than a fully connected network.
    Version:
    January 2014
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
    CDN, CT, Serialized Form
